Home.Spot Description: Trade hundreds of spot and perpetual pairs with up to 60x leverage – permissionless and non-custodial.
Home.Stake Description: Stake your digital assets to create revenue streams. From concentrated liquidity to Single Token Vaults that make DeFi easy – there’s something for everyone.
Home.Social Description: A growth hacking tool for protocols, a money-making machine for influencers, and a gamified DeFi experience for you. Host your own trading competition, follow your friends, and have fun.
Home.How description: THENA is a community-driven decentralized exchange, powered by a self-optimizing ve3,3 model, serving BNB Chain projects with their liquidity needs.
Home.THE Tokenomics Content: THENA uses a self-optimizing ve3,3 based system designed to sustainably reward all contributing participants.
Home.STEP 1 Description: Protocols that seek to open a gauge to be voted on have to request a whitelisting by presenting a proposal.
Home.STEP 2 Description: Once the gauge has been initiated, anyone can add incentives with just a few clicks. The incentives are set per epoch, which lasts for 7 days.
Home.STEP 3 Description: The emissions are distributed to the gauges for the new epoch based on votes from veTHE holders.
Home.Theseus: DeFi native, self-appointed tokenomist. Started as a consultant in web3 back in early 2020, and quickly realized he wanted to build his own systems. Always keen on engaging with the citizens of THENA. Together we build.
Home.0xApollo: DeFi maven with over a decade of experience in various industries. Inspired by the god of truth and prophecy. Passionate about seeking higher knowledge. Claims to live in a simulation.
Home.Xermes: Enjoys turning chaos into functional organizations. Believes in direct communication, hates misinformation. Wandering around DeFi playgrounds for a while. Famous for herding the cats.
Home.Theonysus: Son of Zeus and a Thenian, Theonysus studied the ancient economics and worked in the banking industry within the realm of gods. Keen to renew with his maternal roots and aware of the revolution, he left the realm to serve THENA.
Home.Prometheus: Security minded master of smart contract engineering. Best known for defying the gods by stealing fire from them and giving it to humanity in the form of technology, knowledge, and civilization. He is also credited with the creation of humanity from clay.
Home.Hyperion: A wizard of all things web, now building THENA inside and out. Stacking sats with the gods since the birth of Bitcoin.
Home.Morpheus: Web3 native, founder & advisor. Morpheus is the ancient Greek god of dreams. The myth says that he would appear in people’s dreams and convey messages from the Thenian gods.
